Visual.Tooltip: Waveform display Shows the loaded tracks' waveforms near the playback position. Drag with mouse to control sound playback. Drop tracks from external file manager here.
Waveform display Shows the loaded tracks' waveforms near the playback position. Drag with mouse to control sound playback. Drop tracks from external file manager here.

Overview.Tooltip: Waveform overview Shows information about the track currently loaded in this channel. Jump around in the track by clicking somewhere on the waveform.
Waveform overview Shows information about the track currently loaded in this channel. Jump around in the track by clicking somewhere on the waveform.

VuMeter.Tooltip: Channel volume Shows the current channel volume
Channel volume Shows the current channel volume
Master channel volume Outputs the current instantaneous master volume for the left channel.
Master channel volume Outputs the current instantaneous master volume for the right channel.

StatusLight.Tooltip: Peak Indicator Indicates when the signal on the channel is clipping, (too loud for the hardware and is being distorted).
Peak Indicator Indicates when the signal on the channel is clipping, (too loud for the hardware and is being distorted).
Master Peak Indicator Indicates when the signal on the Master output is clipping, (too loud for the hardware and is being distorted).

Text.Tooltip: Track information Displays the Name and Title of the loaded track. Informations are extracted from the tracks tags.
Track information Displays the Name and Title of the loaded track. Informations are extracted from the tracks tags.

NumberBpm.Tooltip: Tempo information Displays the tempo of the loaded track (BPM=beat per minute)
Tempo information Displays the tempo of the loaded track (BPM=beat per minute)

NumberPos.Tooltip: Time information Displays the current playback position or remaining time of the loaded track. Depends on your settings in Preferences→Interface→Position display.
Time information Displays the current playback position or remaining time of the loaded track. Depends on your settings in Preferences→Interface→Position display.

NumberRate.Tooltip: Pitch rate information Displays the current pitch of the track based on the original tempo.
Pitch rate information Displays the current pitch of the track based on the original tempo.

SliderComposed.Tooltip: Volume control Adjust the volume of the selected channel.
Volume control Adjust the volume of the selected channel.
Crossfader Fade between the channels and define what you hear through the master output. Change the crossfader curve in Preferences→Crossfader
Pitch control Changes the tempo of the track currently loaded when it is moved
Pitch control Changes the tempo of the track currently loaded when it is moved

PushButton.Tooltip: Play/Pause Left-click: Toggles playing or pausing the track. Right-click: Places a Cue-point at the current position on the waveform.
Play/Pause Left-click: Toggles playing or pausing the track. Right-click: Places a Cue-point at the current position on the waveform.

Cue Left-click (while playing): The track will seek to the cue-point and stop (=CDJ) OR play (=simple). Change the default cue behaviour in Preferences→Interface. Left-click (while stopped): Places a cue-point at the current position on the waveform. Right-click: The track will seek to the cue-point and stop.

Cue Left-click (while playing): The track will seek to the cue-point and stop (=CDJ) OR play (=simple). Change the default cue behaviour in Preferences→Interface. Left-click (while stopped): Places a cue-point at the current position on the waveform. Right-click: The track will seek to the cue-point and stop.

Hotcue Left-click: If Hotcue is set, seeks the player to Hotcue position. If Hotcue is not set, sets Hotcue to the current play position. Right-click: If Hotcue is set, clears its hotcue status (delete).

Hotcue Left-click: If Hotcue is set, seeks the player to Hotcue position. If Hotcue is not set, sets Hotcue to the current play position. Right-click: If Hotcue is set, clears its hotcue status (delete).

Hotcue Left-click: If Hotcue is set, seeks the player to Hotcue position. If Hotcue is not set, sets Hotcue to the current play position. Right-click: If Hotcue is set, clears its hotcue status (delete).

Hotcue Left-click: If Hotcue is set, seeks the player to Hotcue position. If Hotcue is not set, sets Hotcue to the current play position. Right-click: If Hotcue is set, clears its hotcue status (delete).

Hotcue Left-click: If Hotcue is set, seeks the player to Hotcue position. If Hotcue is not set, sets Hotcue to the current play position. Right-click: If Hotcue is set, clears its hotcue status (delete).

Hotcue Left-click: If Hotcue is set, seeks the player to Hotcue position. If Hotcue is not set, sets Hotcue to the current play position. Right-click: If Hotcue is set, clears its hotcue status (delete).

Hotcue Left-click: If Hotcue is set, seeks the player to Hotcue position. If Hotcue is not set, sets Hotcue to the current play position. Right-click: If Hotcue is set, clears its hotcue status (delete).

Hotcue Left-click: If Hotcue is set, seeks the player to Hotcue position. If Hotcue is not set, sets Hotcue to the current play position. Right-click: If Hotcue is set, clears its hotcue status (delete).

Hotcue Left-click: If Hotcue is set, seeks the player to Hotcue position. If Hotcue is not set, sets Hotcue to the current play position. Right-click: If Hotcue is set, clears its hotcue status (delete).

Hotcue Left-click: If Hotcue is set, seeks the player to Hotcue position. If Hotcue is not set, sets Hotcue to the current play position. Right-click: If Hotcue is set, clears its hotcue status (delete).

Hotcue Left-click: If Hotcue is set, seeks the player to Hotcue position. If Hotcue is not set, sets Hotcue to the current play position. Right-click: If Hotcue is set, clears its hotcue status (delete).

Hotcue Left-click: If Hotcue is set, seeks the player to Hotcue position. If Hotcue is not set, sets Hotcue to the current play position. Right-click: If Hotcue is set, clears its hotcue status (delete).
Loop-In marker Sets the player loop-in position to the current play position.
Loop-In marker Sets the player loop-in position to the current play position.
Loop-Out marker Sets the player loop-out position to the current play position.
Loop-Out marker Sets the player loop-out position to the current play position.
Loop/Exit Toggles the current loop on or off. Works only if Loop-In and Loop-Out marker are set.
Loop/Exit Toggles the current loop on or off. Works only if Loop-In and Loop-Out marker are set.
Reverse Toggles reverse playback when pressed during regular playback
Reverse Toggles reverse playback when pressed during regular playback
Fast Forward Left-click: Fast forward through the track. Right-click: Jumps to the end of the track.
Fast Rewind Left-click: Fast rewind through the track. Right-click: Jumps to the beginning of the track.
Fast Forward Left-click: Fast forward through the track. Right-click: Jumps to the end of the track.
Fast Rewind Left-click: Fast rewind through the track. Right-click: Jumps to the beginning of the track.
Syncronize Attempts to automatically match the tempo of the track in this channel with tempo of the track in the other channel, based on the calculated BPM.
Syncronize Attempts to automatically match the tempo of the track in this channel with tempo of the track in the other channel, based on the calculated BPM.
Raise pitch Left-click: Sets the pitch higher Right-click: Sets the pitch higher in small steps. Change the the amount of the steps in Preferences→Interface menu.
Raise pitch Left-click: Sets the pitch higher Right-click: Sets the pitch higher in small steps. Change the the amount of the steps in Preferences→Interface menu.
Lower pitch Left-click: Sets the pitch lower Right-click: Sets the pitch lower in small steps. Change the the amount of the steps in Preferences→Interface menu.
Lower pitch Left-click: Sets the pitch lower Right-click: Sets the pitch lower in small steps. Change the the amount of the steps in Preferences→Interface menu.
Raise pitch temporary (nudge) Left-click: Holds the pitch higher while active Right-click: Holds the pitch higher (small amount) while active Change the amount of the steps in Preferences→Interface
Raise pitch temporary (nudge) Left-click: Holds the pitch higher while active Right-click: Holds the pitch higher (small amount) while active Change the amount of the steps in Preferences→Interface
Lower pitch temporary(nudge) Left-click: Holds the pitch lower while active Right-click: Holds the pitch lower (small amount) while active Change the amount of the steps in Preferences→Interface.
Lower pitch temporary(nudge) Left-click: Holds the pitch lower while active Right-click: Holds the pitch lower (small amount) while active Change the amount of the steps in Preferences→Interface.
Headphone Sends the selected channel's audio to the Headphones output audio device selected in Preferences→Sound Hardware.
Headphone Sends the selected channel's audio to the Headphones output audio device selected in Preferences→Sound Hardware.
End of track mode Determines Mixxx's behaviour when it reaches the end of the track.
End of track mode Determines Mixxx's behaviour when it reaches the end of the track.
Flanger Toggles the flange effect. Use the depth/delay/lfo knobs to adjust
Flanger Toggles the flange effect. Use the depth/delay/lfo knobs to adjust
High EQ kill Holds the gain of the high EQ to zero while active.
Mid EQ kill Holds the gain of the mid EQ to zero while active.
Low EQ kill Holds the gain of the low EQ to zero while active.
High EQ kill Holds the gain of the high EQ to zero while active.
Mid EQ kill Holds the gain of the mid EQ to zero while active.
Low EQ kill Holds the gain of the low EQ to zero while active.

Knob.Tooltip: Master volume Adjusts the Master output volume.
Balance Adjusts the left/right channel balance on the Master output.
Flanger delay Adjusts the phase delay of the flange effect (when active).
Flanger depth Adjusts the intensity of the flange effect (when active).
Flanger period Adjusts the wavelength of the flange effect (when active).
Headphone volume Adjusts the headphone output volume.
Headphone mix Controls what you hear on the headphone output.
Gain Adjusts the pre-fader gain of the track (to avoid clipping)
High EQ Adjusts the gain of the high EQ filter.
Mid EQ Adjusts the gain of the mid EQ filter.
Low EQ Adjusts the gain of the low EQ filter.
Gain Adjusts the pre-fader gain of the track (to avoid clipping)
High EQ Adjusts the gain of the high EQ filter.
Mid EQ Adjusts the gain of the mid EQ filter.
Low EQ Adjusts the gain of the low EQ filter.
